objects.text:
• Premium Cotton Fabric
• Comfortable Regular Fit
• Stylish Typography Design

LIMITED TIME OFFER
DON'T MISS OUT!

banner_details:
This visually striking banner features a bold apparel promotion, divided vertically with a dashed yellow line. The left side showcases text-based design elements, starting with a large, eye-catching headline (`heading_1`, `heading_2`) in white and yellow. Below it, the brand name (`brand_name`) and product title (`product_name`) are neatly stacked, followed by key product features (`product_features`) in bullet points. A limited-time urgency message (`urgency_text`) is also included. The price (`price`) pops in a futuristic typeface, and a vibrant rectangular “SHOP NOW” call-to-action button (`cta_button_background`, `cta`) wraps up the section. The right features a high-resolution product image (`product_image`) of a model wearing the T-shirt. The backdrop includes subtle geometric graphics and gradients for depth.

**Color Palette:**
- Background Gradient: #212121 → #121212
- Accent Yellow: #FFD500
- Deep Yellow: #FFA000
- Text White: #FFFFFF
- CTA Text Black: #000000
- Divider Line: #FFD500
- Highlight Shapes (transparent): Accent Yellow at 15–20% opacity
product_color: The product image features a bold and youthful design centered around a high-contrast color palette. The primary color is deep black (#000000), which serves as the base of the t-shirt, creating a strong background. Bright yellow (#FFC800) is used prominently in the “drew” logo, giving it vibrancy and instant attention. The black outline around the yellow text maintains clarity and contrast, ensuring the logo stands out. Subtle tones such as light denim blue (#7DA7D9) from the jeans and skin-tones (#F7C9B6) create a balanced, natural feel. These colors can be used harmoniously in an advertisement banner to convey modernity and bold style.
